title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: H. Mellie B
text:
H. Mellie B

Data Analyst | Epidemiologist | Researcher
PhD-qualified epidemiologist and data analyst with over a decade of experience in public health research, data analysis, and teaching. Published over 30 peer-reviewed articles, cited more than 10,000 times, with work featured in CNN, CBSNEWS, and Fox13now. Expertise in cancer epidemiology, health disparities, maternal and child health, and communicable diseases. Skilled in advanced statistical modeling, linked administrative data analysis, and systematic reviews. Secured over $265,200 in research grants. Passionate about evidence-based research, policy translation, and improving health outcomes through data-driven decision-making.
